channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories Gifts
channel.desc: This new show will focus on reinforcing the three golden rules - cleanse, tone and moisturise. Caroline will also explain how to choose the right moisturiser for the season and your skin type.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Braun
channel.desc: Discover perfect beauty gifts with Braun. Explore innovative grooming tools and pampering essentials to delight your loved ones this festive season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Silver Jewellery Edit
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite silver jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Algenist Biotechnological Skincare
channel.desc: Founded by a team of biotechnology scientists in San Francisco, Algenist focuses on the ability of effective, bioactive ingredients, including Alguronic Acid, to deliver visible anti-ageing results.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories Gifts
channel.desc: This new show will focus on reinforcing the three golden rules - cleanse, tone and moisturise. Caroline will also explain how to choose the right moisturiser for the season and your skin type.
